title: Keeping Her Warm
description: Catherine has fallen in desperate times and has done some things she’s not proud of.  Cole is the beloved town sheriff, but he’s missing something in his life.  When a snowstorm hits and the two of them are thrown together, things heat up. But when Catherine’s truth is exposed, will Cole still need her warmth?  Warning: Fire ignites in this insta-love quickie, so grab a bucket of ice to go with it. Find out what happens in this small-town romance that’s full of sexy snuggles and alpha ownership.
author: Alexa Riley
